about_the_game:
The VRC-Pro Bashing & Crawling pack is the ultimate pack for bashers and crashers. The pack contains 2 special basher tracks: Fear Farm and C-Netic. We removed all the track piping so you have the whole track area to bash around. Go anywhere you want, in any direction. Take jumps from any side. The fun and excitement just never stops. The pack contains the Basher 'modified' chassis meaning that you have a choise of setup options and components to play with and get the ultimate performance out of your basher. The Crawler chassis is based on the Basher, with narrower tires and has very short gearing for precize manouvring on the many crawling obstacles.

Imagine, bash and crash as much and hard as you like and never have to spend a penny or a second on repairing your car. Imagine bashing and crashing with your friends in multi-player mode, chasing each other around these wide open track looking for the ultimate crash, on the ground or in the air. And being able to show the play-back video on your favorite social media platform... Bashing doesn't get any better and cheaper than this.

And looking for some more controlled off-road r/c challenge? Load the Crawler chassis and try to master the many crawling obstacles on the Fear Farm and C-Netic Bashing Grounds. A serious challenge ahead, especially in multi-player, with other cars chasing and pushing you.

You can take your basher also on to the any of the world renowned international off-road tracks and try to master the track with your basher!

Bashing - crashing - crawling: VRC PPRO BRINGS IT ON!
detailed_description:
The VRC-Pro Bashing & Crawling pack is the ultimate pack for bashers and crashers. The pack contains 2 special basher tracks: Fear Farm and C-Netic. We removed all the track piping so you have the whole track area to bash around. Go anywhere you want, in any direction. Take jumps from any side. The fun and excitement just never stops. The pack contains the Basher 'modified' chassis meaning that you have a choise of setup options and components to play with and get the ultimate performance out of your basher. The Crawler chassis is based on the Basher, with narrower tires and has very short gearing for precize manouvring on the many crawling obstacles.

Imagine, bash and crash as much and hard as you like and never have to spend a penny or a second on repairing your car. Imagine bashing and crashing with your friends in multi-player mode, chasing each other around these wide open track looking for the ultimate crash, on the ground or in the air. And being able to show the play-back video on your favorite social media platform... Bashing doesn't get any better and cheaper than this.

And looking for some more controlled off-road r/c challenge? Load the Crawler chassis and try to master the many crawling obstacles on the Fear Farm and C-Netic Bashing Grounds. A serious challenge ahead, especially in multi-player, with other cars chasing and pushing you.

You can take your basher also on to the any of the world renowned international off-road tracks and try to master the track with your basher!

Bashing - crashing - crawling: VRC PPRO BRINGS IT ON!

subs.option_text: VRC PRO Bashing and Crawling pack - $24.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy VRC PRO Bashing & Crawling Car & Track pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 3, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Pixel Shader 2.0 graphics card (nVidia GeForce FX 5600 or ATI Radeon X600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated RAM, Pixel Shader 3.0 graphics card (AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: VRC USB adapter or controller, for hosting multiplayer sessions high upstream connection is recommended

short_description: The VRC-Pro Bashing & Crawling pack is the ultimate pack for bashers and crashers. The Basher & Crawler pack contains 2 special basher tracks: Fear Farm and C-Netic, and the Basher and Carwler chassis and components. Go anywhere you want, in any direction. Take jumps from any side. Just have fun!
